hero.subtitle: At Enjaz Group, we believe that excellence is not an option, but a commitment we work on daily to shape the future. The group excels in transforming challenges into opportunities for success, reinforcing its position as one of the leading entities in the market.

errors.firstName: First name is required and must be at least 2 characters
errors.lastName: Last name is required and must be at least 2 characters
errors.phone: Phone number is required and must be at least 8 digits

about.title: About Us
about.companyJourney: The Journey of Injaaz Global Group
about.companyJourneyText: Injaaz Global Group, originating from the heart of Riyadh, represents a pioneering model of Saudi Arabia in providing specialized and comprehensive solutions serving various economic sectors. The group was founded by Mr. Mohammed Saleh Al-Suwaih and Mr. Ali Saleh Al-Suwaih over 20 years ago, with an ambitious vision aimed at developing innovative and diverse services according to the highest local and international standards. The group began its journey with numerous and diverse services that meet the needs of different sectors and continued to expand its scope to include advanced solutions based on the latest technologies and strategic partnerships.
about.companySuccessText: The group has distinguished itself by its ability to turn challenges into success opportunities, strengthening its position as one of the leading entities in the market, with a team of more than 700 employees and the trust of over 3,000 clients in various fields. The group has received several prestigious awards, including the 'Best Work Environment 2024' award, and has entered into strategic partnerships with international organizations such as NATO. Injaaz Global Group is committed to global quality standards and holds accredited certifications like ISO, reflecting its firm vision for excellence and innovation in various services.
about.futureVisionText: Injaaz Global Group, which combines innovation and expertise, is an ideal partner for enhancing operational efficiency and economic growth. With its commitment to global standards and integrated solutions, it has become a leader in supporting economic activities locally and globally. One of its founders holds honorary consul positions for Malawi and is a special advisor to Uganda, overseeing labor files for several African countries. He also heads the Ugandan Islamic Chamber of Commerce and the Saudi Business Council, further strengthening regional and international economic relations.
about.leadershipText: Injaaz Global Group strives to be the cornerstone in achieving sustainable development goals and Vision 2030 by innovating in providing integrated services that enhance customer experience and create economic and social value. At Injaaz Global Group, we believe that 'Excellence is not an option, it is a commitment' that we work on daily to build the future.
